tasks.task: Adjusting tractor tires' air pressure and ballasting for optimal slip percentage.
subtasks: Ensuring proper inflation for desired slip percentage (2-4%).
Verifying ground contact with 3 bars on the ground.
Adjusting air pressure based on equipment attached to the rear of the tractor.
Properly ballasting the tractor by adding weights to the front and inside of duals.
Setting different weights to address weight issues.
